sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TestPingReportIterRes( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationNum INT, FrameCount INT, PortHandle INT, PortGroupTagName TEXT,
SrcAddress TEXT, DstAddress TEXT, SuccessfulPingCount INT, FailedPingCount INT, AttemptedPingCount INT, PingStringResult TEXT )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TestPingReportSummaryRes( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationNum INT, FrameCount INT, PortHandle INT, PortGroupTagName TEXT,
SrcAddress TEXT, DstAddress TEXT, SuccessfulPingCount INT, FailedPingCount INT, AttemptedPingCount INT, PingStringResult TEXT )

Children.Name: Run SQL Command: Add Iteration/Summary Ping Report

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Add Iteration/Summary Ping Report

sql_statement.static: SELECT spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand.Iteration as IterationNum,
AS FrameCount, PgTag.PortHandle AS PortHandle, PgTag.TagName AS PortGroupTagName, '
' AS SrcAddress, '
' AS DstAddress, PingReport.SuccessfulPingCount AS SuccessfulPingCount, PingReport.FailedPingCount AS FailedPingCount,
PingReport.AttemptedPingCount AS AttemptedPingCount, PingReport.PingResult AS PingStringResult
FROM spirent_methodology_ObjectIteratorCommand, PingReport,
(SELECT Port.Handle AS PortHandle, Tag.Name AS TagName
FROM Port, Tag,
(SELECT SourceHnd, TargetHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE Type=='UserTag') AS UserTagTable
WHERE Port.Handle == UserTagTable.SourceHnd AND Tag.Handle == UserTagTable.TargetHnd)
AS PgTag WHERE PingReport.ParentHnd == PgTag.PortHandle GROUP BY PortHandle

SELECT IterationNum, FrameCount, PortHandle, PortGroupTagName, SrcAddress, DstAddress, SuccessfulPingCount, FailedPingCount, AttemptedPingCount, PingStringResult FROM TestPingReportIterRes GROUP BY IterationNum, PortHandle
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TestFailedPingReportVerdictTable

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Failed sending all configured Pings or at least one Ping didn't receive a response.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT Verdict FROM TestFailedPingReportVerdictTable WHERE Verdict = 'FAIL')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterationNum AS 'Iteration',

CASE WHEN FailedPingCount > 0 THEN 'FAIL' WHEN AttemptedPingCount > 0 AND SuccessfulPingCount < FrameCount THEN 'FAIL' WHEN AttemptedPingCount == 0 AND FrameCount > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict',
PortGroupTagName AS 'Port Group Tag Name', FrameCount AS 'Frame Count', SrcAddress AS 'Source Address', DstAddress AS 'Destination Address',
AttemptedPingCount AS 'Attempted Ping Count', SuccessfulPingCount AS 'Successful Ping Count', FailedPingCount AS 'Failed Ping Count', PingStringResult AS 'Ping Result'
FROM TestPingReportIterRes
WHERE PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'

Children.Name: Wait: Allow RT Table to Update

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Wait: Allow RT Table to Update

Properties.Name: XAxisCategories
Value: SELECT IterationNum from TestPingReportSummaryRes where PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'

Properties.Name: Series
Value: SELECT FrameCount AS 'Configured Frame Count' FROM TestPingReportSummaryRes where PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'
SELECT SuccessfulPingCount AS 'Successful Ping Count' from TestPingReportSummaryRes where PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'
SELECT FailedPingCount AS 'Failed Ping Count' from TestPingReportSummaryRes where PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'
SELECT AttemptedPingCount AS 'Attempted Ping Count' from TestPingReportSummaryRes where PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Summary results for all Ping iterations.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Summary results for all Ping iterations.

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterationNum AS 'Iteration',

CASE WHEN FailedPingCount > 0 THEN 'FAIL' WHEN AttemptedPingCount > 0 AND SuccessfulPingCount < FrameCount THEN 'FAIL' WHEN AttemptedPingCount == 0 AND FrameCount > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict',
PortGroupTagName AS 'Port Group Tag Name', FrameCount AS 'Frame Count', SrcAddress AS 'Source Address', DstAddress AS 'Destination Address',
AttemptedPingCount AS 'Attempted Ping Count', SuccessfulPingCount AS 'Successful Ping Count', FailedPingCount AS 'Failed Ping Count', PingStringResult AS 'Ping Result'
FROM TestPingReportSummaryRes
WHERE PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='TestFailedPingSummaryTable')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterationNum AS 'Iteration',
PortGroupTagName AS 'Port Group Tag Name', FrameCount AS 'Frame Count', SrcAddress AS 'Source Address', DstAddress AS 'Destination Address',
AttemptedPingCount AS 'Attempted Ping Count', SuccessfulPingCount AS 'Successful Ping Count', FailedPingCount AS 'Failed Ping Count', PingStringResult AS 'Ping Result'
FROM TestPingReportSummaryRes
WHERE PortGroupTagName = 'WestPorts'
AND ((FailedPingCount > 0) OR (AttemptedPingCount > 0 AND SuccessfulPingCount < FrameCount) OR (AttemptedPingCount == 0 AND FrameCount > 0))

ExpProperties.EpDescription: West Ports that send the ping

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 778
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Ports that reply to the ping
